title: The new Bose QC 45 noise-canceling headphones are now available in India
content:
In August last year, Bose launched new noise-canceling headphones as part of its popular Quiet Comfort range — the Bose QC 45. Compared to the older Bose QC 35 II, the new headphones offered better noise cancellation, a new transparency mode called “Aware Mode,” upgraded calling performance, and longer battery life.
